issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description: I developed a custom Android module. In this module I am opening a activity using launchActivityForResult, but when the activity finished , onResult method is not called!
fields.summary: AndroidModule:onResult is not called back for launchActivityForResult

comments.body:
Hello,
initially this looks more like a question that you might want to ask at: 

developer.appcelerator.com/questions/

If you still think this is a bug, please read the guide to reporting issues: 

http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/3.0/#!/guide/How_to_Submit_a_Bug_Report

And then provide at least:

- Description of the problem
- Steps to reproduce the problem (i.e., we can't get your module code, since it will be public. We recommend in this cases to do a default module and then add the necessary code that reproduces the issue). The smaller and simpler the testcase, the better. 
- Actual Results
- Expected Results. 

Best Regards
